installation.script:
# NodeJS discord.js installer

echo "Installer will start in 5 secconds"
sleep 1
echo "Installer will start in 4 secconds"
sleep 1
echo "Installer will start in 3 secconds"
sleep 1
echo "Installer will start in 2 secconds"
sleep 1
echo "Installer will start in 1 secconds"
sleep 1
echo -e               "########################################################"
echo -e "#\033[1;39;44m    ___      _     _                 _                \033[0m#"
echo -e "#\033[1;39;44m   / __\___ | | __| | /\  /\___  ___| |_   ___ _   _  \033[0m#"
echo -e '#\033[1;39;44m  / /  / _ \| |/ _` |/ /_/ / _ \/ __| __| / _ \ | | | \033[0m#'
echo -e '#\033[1;39;44m / /__| (_) | | (_| / __  / (_) \__ \ |_ |  __/ |_| | \033[0m#'
echo -e '#\033[1;39;44m \____/\___/|_|\__,_\/ /_/ \___/|___/\__(_)___|\__,_| \033[0m#'
echo -e "#\033[1;39;44m                                                      \033[0m#"
echo -e               "########################################################"
echo -e ""
echo -e "Installer is starting... "

if [ $GIT_DOWNLOAD = 1 ]; then
    echo "Removing all files..."
    rm -rf /mnt/server/*
    echo "Pulling all"
    git clone $GIT_REPO
    name=$(basename "$GIT_REPO")
    cp -r ${name%.git}/. /mnt/server/
    echo "Done!"
else
    echo Downloading example files...
    downloader https://raw.githubusercontent.com/NyxoServers/eggs/refs/heads/master/bots/discord/langs/node/bot.js /mnt/server/bot.js
    downloader https://raw.githubusercontent.com/NyxoServers/eggs/refs/heads/master/bots/discord/langs/node/package.json /mnt/server/package.json
    echo "Done!"
fi
